name: Passing (LastMinuteSM)
description:
So I had uni that came up so I did not have enough time to finish this game - here's what I ended up with. I hope at least you can salvage some of the source code if you like a certain feature. I just submitted out of respect for everyone else who worked hard and I can't wait till the next jam. 

-edit: Something went wrong with the conversion to WebGL. The Player image is not properly shown.
